doshas.Vata: Back, Legs, Thighs, Bones and large intestines are controlled by Vata.
doshas.Pitta: Blood, Sweating, Lymphatic system, Metabolism and Small intestines are controlled by Pitta.
doshas.Kapha: Chest, Head, Neck, Joints, Upper parts of intestine and Fat are controlled by Kapha.

1.diseases: Health issues depend on the level of the pitta in the body and may cause heart disease, headache, dental, eye related and urinary disorders.

2.diseases: Suffer from stomach disorders, gastric and gastro infections, intestinal tumor, mental debility and lung related problems.
remedy: Eat watermelon, cabbage, banana and mustard seeds.
At night keep a water bottle next to bed and next morning pour that water to a plant.
Consume pepper and honey in the morning.

3.diseases: Nervous problems, back pain, leg pain, sciatica, skin disease, gastric issues, bone pains, throat diseases and paralysis.
remedy: Eat apple, cherry, pomegranate, grapes, figs and almonds.
Take special care of health in the months of February, June, September and December.

4.diseases: Respiratory system related issues, heart diseases, blood pressure, leg injury, insomnia, headache, backache and eye diseases.
remedy: Take special care in the months of January, February, July, August and September.
Drink fruit juice but avoid fruits at daytime; take after sunset.
Use more green vegetables and sprouts.

5.diseases: Indigestion, mental tension, headache, cough, cold, eyesight issues, arm and shoulder pain and paralysis.
remedy: Take special care in the months of June, September and December.

6.diseases: Throat, kidney, chest and urinary issues, heart disease, diseases related to private parts, diabetes, stones and lung problems.
remedy: Take care of your health in the months of May, October and November.
Consume protein rich food such as sprouts.

7.diseases: Indigestion, stomach problems, dark circles under eyes, headache, blood disorders, skin problems and lung related issues.
remedy: Drink plenty of apple or other fruit juices.
Take care of health in the months of January, February, July and August.

8.diseases: Liver problems, vata related health issues, blood related problems, urinary system disorders, depression and weakness.
remedy: Eat palak, banana, cucumber, green vegetables and fruits.
Take care of health in the months of January, February, July, September and December.
Use vitamins A, D and E, calcium and iron.

9.diseases: Digestive system problems, burning sensations, urinary problems, fever, headache, dental issues, piles, blood disorders and skin disease.
